name: slime dungeon
description:
Slime Dungeon is a 2D action-adventure slasher. You are the role of Gubby - a duck-like warrior going to save the world, evil slugs are everywhere, find ancient artifacts to completely defeat the slimes and their summoners, Traveling through the labyrinth, and destroying all the slugs around, find all the stones to collect them together and fight the slime creators, bosses are waiting for you! and lots of adventure, save the world!

Features:
  • Music by 8BITyOUI
  • graphic by Lenstroy
  • an unforgettable adventure and wars against smileys
